attributes.action: ackowledge in the next Honours List the outstanding contribution to entertainment of Mr Bernard Cribbins, a National Treasure if ever there was one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
111 appearances on Jackanory, voicing the Wombles, Wilf Mott in Doctor Who, and still going strong at nearly 81.

People far less deserving have been awarded honours, it's about time Mr Cribbins received the acknowledgement he deserves.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
